snippet: The police commissioner said detectives had taken Timothy Montalvo, 16, into custody for possessing the weapon used in the killing of Raphael Ward last week on the Lower East Side.
abstract: The police commissioner said detectives had taken Timothy Montalvo, 16, into custody for possessing the weapon used in the killing of Raphael Ward last week on the Lower East Side.

headline.main: Boy, 16, Charged With Murder in Death of Another 16-Year-Old
